title: Gold 2 and sliver 1 duo q
body:
Im gold 2 and my friend is sliver 1
If i duo with him will that shit fk up my mmr?  like elo hell mmr?.

replies.body: It won't do anything to your MMR but what it will do is put you both in the same matches but different difficulty levels. What may seem like an easy game to you is going to be harder for your friend. Does that make sense ? They have a faq that will also help I could link you: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h4q2 {{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
